TopicTitle: Mod Desired: AutoThumbnail - Automatically Generate Thumbnails Without Having to Load Every Craft You Have

Articles.Content:
When you load craft into your SPH or VAB, you have to load each one of them in the game currently in order to generate a thumbnail. 

Does anyone think it would be cool if there was a mod that could do this for you automatically so whenever you load a craft into SPH or VAB, that the Load Craft screen would see a thumbnail of it, without having to load the craft?

A workaround in waiting for your desires could is to transfert the thumbnails too when you export your save a new KSP version ( that is why you need it?),

they are in: Kerbal Space Program\thumbs
